name: ORBIS (Lu_Bu, larzvegaz, NutVonDaHazel)
description:
Our entry for Mini Beans Jam 6

Our planet is dead. It‘s resources are depleted.
We found ORBIS years ago and started building spaceships. Many have died, many more died fleeing our planet. Astroids are blocking our path to our safe haven and destroyed almost every ship. Only one, the Atlas, is left. We must evacuate the planet now. Help us.
Assign people where you need them, destroy astroids, take us to safety.
But be aware of the limited space on Atlas and our systems only work if people mount them.
Choose how many you can spare on your runs.

Good Luck

———————————
You can play this game with keyboard and controller

Move spaceship - WASD / Arrow Buttons
Shoot - Space

———————————
Lukas - Programming / VFX
Lars - Art
Felix - Sound
